title: Hyatt Regency Gurgaon wins The Great Indian Wedding Awards for one of The Best Wedding Hotels in the countryTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Hyatt Regency Gurgaon wins The Great Indian Wedding Awards for one of The Best Wedding Hotels in the country Published on : Thursday, August 13, 2015
Hyatt Regency Gurgaon won the award for the Best Wedding Hotels during Global Indian Wedding Awards 2015 supported by International Convention of the Wedding Fraternity (ICWF). This glittering event featuring the crème de la crème of the wedding fraternity was held on August 1, 2015 at Hyatt Regency Gurgaon.
ICWF presents a forum where all industry members – pioneers, leaders and aspiring entrepreneurs from across the globe, work in complete synergy as a fraternity to share their ideas, accomplishments and achievements for the betterment of the Indian wedding industry
Mr. Roger Wright, General Manager, Hyatt Regency Gurgaon was proud and delighted to receive the award and said, “It is truly an honor for us to be awarded as One of the Best Wedding Hotels in the Country. We are grateful to our patrons and ICWF for their belief in the brand and proud that my team and i have been able to live up to the expectations of our valued guests.”
Hyatt Regency Gurgaon infact offers an ideal venue with its grand banqueting spaces and lavish outdoor locations for an exclusive, engaging and elaborate wedding. Spread over an expansive space of 40,000 sq. ft., the banqueting space of the hotel consists of the magnificent Regency Ballroom, spaces which are flexible to support multiple celebrations and wedding ceremonies and a pre function area. The one of its kind Regency Ballroom at HRG is spread over 20,710 sq. ft. with a ceiling height of 28 ft. It can accommodate up to 3,000 guests and can be used to organize weddings that embody grandeur, style and understated luxury.
Source:- Hyatt
